Clause 4.1
HIGH
Context of Organization

Has the organization determined external and internal issues relevant to its purpose and strategic direction that affect its ability to achieve the intended results of its QMS?

Industry Context: Critical for organizations due to regulatory environment, market factors, and stakeholder responsibilities

Clause 4.2
HIGH
Context of Organization

Has the organization determined relevant interested parties and their requirements relevant to the QMS?

Industry Context: Fundamental for understanding customer, regulatory, and stakeholder expectations

Clause 4.3
CRITICAL
Context of Organization

Has the organization determined the scope of its QMS, considering the issues and requirements identified above?

Industry Context: Defines the boundaries and applicability of the quality management system

Clause 4.4
CRITICAL
Context of Organization

Has the organization established, implemented, and maintained a QMS including the processes needed and their interactions?

Industry Context: Core requirement for systematic quality management and process control

Clause 5.1.1
CRITICAL
Leadership

Does top management demonstrate leadership and commitment with respect to the QMS?

Industry Context: Essential for establishing quality culture and organizational commitment to excellence

Clause 5.1.2
CRITICAL
Leadership

Does top management demonstrate leadership and commitment with respect to customer focus?

Industry Context: Fundamental for ensuring customer satisfaction and service quality
